message.body: still don't know how I feel about this google talk app
so have you decided what you're doing tonight?
I'd like to come down, but at the same time, I desperately need a good night's sleep at this point
well, kristin is having bible study here tonight, if that helps
not really sure what time that is though
As long as it's not a crazy party night or anything
but the "I" form of tener is tengo
It's one of the weird conjugations
sure, but I'm just being clear
now that we've cleared that up
Liz: Uhm no hay condoms I just discovered wait, wrong verb I think me: yo tiene Liz: no tengo condoms
yo tengo, would be more correct I suppose
I thought you were correcting mine, not making a separate statement
I get my Spanish and French twisted around
Good, so that's not an impediment
I really do need to brush up on my spanish
I got some a little while ago
I wouldn't mind trying to regain some of mine, but I doubt I'd be helpful to you
ok, so what would we do?
assuming we don't stick around for bible study?
I'm going to swing by Iron Hill Newark, probably before going to your place
But I don't plan on being there for long
uh, if you consider beer a date, then sure
I was talking to you from my gmail window, which I just closed, and now Im back on talk
but all that conversation is missing
im sure, but it's not helping me now
Andres: hot date? me: uh, if you consider beer a date, then sure http://www.ironhillbrewery.com/newark/monthly-events.htm
I thought you two broke up?
I've sort of been taking it easy lately
I had like 4 beers the other night, 2 margaritas last night
haha, so I txt claire and asked her how HH was without me. She replies and asks me how my date went and added, "I hope it was rubbish"
the "rubbish" part puts it over the top
makes me feel a little bad though
I need to find $400 in spare cash lol
I need to find $1000 in spare cash
aww, I got another text from Claire, said she shouldn't have asked me that as it's none of her bees wax
I appreciate both of those things
we just didn't hit if off on some level on tuesday
I enjoy her company, but I just don't know
I'm not able to have the conversation that I am looking for with her
At least, I think you talking about her legs was in a complimentary manner
eh, they are a bit much
she actually has a really nice figure
I really don't know what that means =/
now her face on the other hand...
she would probably make a fantastic girlfriend though
There's nothing wrong with her face o.o
It's showing up black on my screen
she doesn't have a traditionally attractive face
I can sort of see that
But not at the same time
well I have spent more time with her
My nose and chin are too big
ok, your nose is not big
but I like big noses, remember?
God, I need to stop looking at my pictures, I'm going to give myself a complex
You know how some times a word will just look WRONG
You know it's spelled right, but it looks wrong?
Just had a moment of that with my face haha
She's bustier than I am, isn't she? /looking at more pictures
she appears to have big breasts, but they seem smaller, once they're "out"
her whole body is like that
Except about the lack of connection ;)
she might just be a bit more shy than I am accustomed to
btw, mine aren't always like this; assuming that I actually stick with this current diet trend for like 2-3 weeks, they'll get a little perkier
Im on okc, and I noticed what appears to be an error on your profile
I have a hard time being outgoing if I can't tell if the person that I'm with is having fun or whatever
And I never initiate physical contact (unless I'm drinking and really feeling daring)

~ Work -- I work with a green construction/development company, helping pull proposals together, primarily in response to federal requests for proposals (RFPs). It's rarely exciting, but the company is pretty awesome. Ideally, I'd be editing, but that's not the cast right now.
I may remember to update that
AND THERE'S NO EDITING IN IT'
and I'm not stalking you on okc or anything
I did a search and you came up
I hadn't even thought about it
If anything I might have assumed there was some detail you vaguely remembered and wanted to double check
I do that all the time with people's profiles haha
I'm actually looking for claires profile
it's actually a very nice pic
I kinda feel like an ass right now
I wasn't saying very nice things
but anyway, I think I'm in love
hmm, working on law school though
I respect people who do the law/med school route
But I don't think I'd ultimately want to settle with someone in either of those fields
The most private thing Iâ€™m willing to admit I've secretly had a crush on you the whole time you've been reading this.
Sorry, I've seen too many things similar to that
what's worse on a first date?
I said nothing to talk about
Yeah. A little superficial in the thought process.
What do you think of mine?
And be honest, because I'm not invested in it at all
we are like a 70% match, but she only answered 27 questions
It's fucking weird how similar Adam and I are
Or, at least, how many of the same thoughts we have had and felt compelled to write about
I think I linked you before
I didn't really scour his profile
Well, that matters to me a little, in the long run, but not right now
and kissing on first date, tacky
He's not trying to court me
There is room for more than one opinion on the matter
Carpe diem, bitches. He was flying out the next morning.
As a rule, I generally avoid the possibility
if he felt like it, then he should have
I'm not going to say it's wrong, it's just tacky, IMHO
Everyone's asking about my hair today lol
Since it's been like this for a week
what the hell am I suppose to do?
I didn't know you were thinking about going
oh, thought I had mentioned it
Probably to someone else in your harem ;)
I like the sound of this verizon 4g installer
so I'm thinking $1500/wk would be average
but they are saying that $3000/wk is doable in GA for the college rush
See, this sort of thing is why I can't imagine living your life
You have no freedom of movement without cash
Yeah, but you can only travel in it sparingly
where the fuck am I going to go?
yeah, so if I want to go to GA I get in my car and I drive there
But you just said you can't do that
I'm pretty sure you don't have the freedom to do that, unless you request to use vacation time
realistically, it would be very difficult for me to take off to GA for a month +
So you'd rather have no obligations and no money
but I would probably still be doing a fair amount of traveling
I could probably jump on a plane tomorrow if I wanted to and just work out of our GA office
I'm just saying, you have no reason to go to GA
Because I have a feeling I'd win on the annual scale
I'm going to GA in September lol
you work a ton more than I do
remember, i'm not concerned with money
Yeah, and yet I'm not the one who constantly says "I have so much to do"
Don't suppose you'd want to come up here tonight, eh?
I'm having a hard time making a decision
I can't do any recreational travel at this point
beach kind of took that off the table for a while
I'm having this weird fantasy right now
about being on a secluded beach somewhere
just me and my lady companion
with the ocean waves in the background
cool breeze coming off the sea
Think I'm going to pass on coming down =/
I'm already feeling tired, and I'm not really up for spending money right now. Or drinking.
Did you not know about that?
I'm cool with you not coming
not to be rude, but it's been kind of a crazy couple of days
yeah, I figured it wouldn't be a big deal
I feel bad for being wishy-washy though
but I felt the same way
it's funny how quickly you can forget about someone
it just seems inevitable that you will be hung up on the last person
I've all but forgotten about ally
and amy to some extent, though she does still bother me regularly
Does that first line mean that it seems inevitable that I'll end up 'with' Adam in some sense?
just that you'll obsess over him until something else comes along
I'm just moving along too fast
I've got to find something to do
At least when approached from a literary perspective
I want to talk to Christine
it was such a nice night out
I want some motherfucking ice cream
maybe I'll see if Claire would like to join me
see, this is where my game-playing instincts usually kick in
Christine is bloody awful at responding to text messages
so I feel the urge to craft something that will get her attention
her last statement said that next time we should do something more 'exciting' than grabbing a drink
Is kind of a boring / cliched date
well she's the one who couldn't get there til 7 and wanted to leave by 9:30
and also refused to suggest anything
I never did get that ice cream last night
Seems you get ice cream about 50% of the times that you want it
and I can live with that. Seems I get what I want about 50% of the time
This yogurt has 18g of sugar in it
this toast w/ pb and agave has significantly less
Yeah, I put it back in the fridge
Going to have to go out and get food
I forgot to pick up food for today's breakfast and lunch when I went grocery shopping last night.
last night was not a complete loss, however
I did manage to get in the hot tub with claire...
my job canceled on me, last minute
interesting how quickly we can move on
tbh, I didn't have anything to move on from
You don't even know about the guy in Florida that I've been flirting with for over a month now
and clearly not interested in anything, either

1) I've had a low-key crush on Rich (FL) since I've met him. 2) I'm not going to get in a serious, monogamous relationship with anyone who lives in another state. 3) Adam is all about open relationships.
At least I only flirt with people who I am interested in and am willing to break my "not wanting" for
I could easily see myself in some kind of semi-serious relationship with Rich or Aram
at least I am not living in denial?
Andres, you have no idea what the fuck I know or think.
You can keep insisting that you know me, but you really don't.
Or, rather, that you know my mind better than I do
all I know is what I see and hear
I don't exhibit or vocalize every thing I feel or believe
that attitude won't get you a semi-anything
you _say_ you don't want anything serious, but only involve yourself with people who you could _see_ the potential for something _semi_ serious
Just because I don't want something super serious right now doesn't mean I'm going to pass up people who I feel connected to/interested in
I know enough about you, your history, and your actions/words
I can at least try to keep things to a lower level of serious for a little while
to make observations about your actions
I've never said that I never want to have a serious relationship ever again.
now, you not talking it personally, that's another matter
Just that I don't want to be serious right now.
I don't think we communicate very well on stuff like this.
and I have established that, although I have been guilty of making that same statement, that the statement is at least somewhat bullshit
I think we express ourselves in a way that's different enough to be completely un-understandable to the other party.
I have *never* stated that I do not *ever* want to be in a serious relationship again.
no, I think you make it fairly clear that you don't like to be criticized
I have no problem being criticized
I have a problem with you presuming that you know what I think more than I do.
And I don't react well to condescension.

That's actually what you're implying when you're like "You say you don't want a serious relationship, but here you are pursuing people you feel seriously about, hurr durr, you're a hypocrite and/or in denial."
I say, and I _keep_ saying, that I don't want a serious relationship _at this point in time_
it's kind of too easy with you
but I like how you come back at me with, "at least I..."
oh, and call me a hypocrite as well
We've already discussed how I feel about you "keeping people on the line"
Did I call you a hypocrite?
keeping people on the line = no chance/interest of actually pursuing anything, but you like the attention so you bait them enough to keep them as an option
pretty sure she gave _me_ her number
curious as to what this bait is that I am using
Ally: You find her relatively dull and uninspiring, but you keep/kept responding to her texts/invitations in spite of it
well, I don't want to be rude
besides, I haven't heard from her in like a week
meaning, I haven't wrote her anything
not pursuing anything, as it wer
and so what if I did?
Amy: You've established that you're not willing to hurt the people around you to date her, but you still went out on dates with her.
I just think it's a dick move, dude.
And I'm sorry, but you're too smart for me to realistically believe you didn't know, at some level, what you were doing by hanging out with her on a one-on-one basis.
a dick move would have been saying, "I don't give a fuck, I'm going to do whatever I want..."
I am allowed, from what I understand, to spend time with my friend
and, for the record, I never said I was a saint
